#summary MySQL-MMM Version 2

= Introduction =

MySQL-MMM 2 is a complete rewrite of MMM. There is no backward compatibility, so you can't use your old configuration with MMM 2.


= Documentation =
See http://mysql-master-master.googlecode.com/files/mysql-mmm-2.0.0-1.pdf

= Installation =

 * For debian/ubuntu/... download .deb files and install them with dpkg.
 * For other linux distributions download and extract .tar.gz and install with make install. There is no install script which checks for dependencies at the moment.
